description: Monitor newly constructed files that may establish persistence by executing malicious content triggered by user inactivity. Analytic 1 - Created on disk that are being used as Screensaver files (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode="11") TargetObject="*\\Software\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Control Panel\\Desktop\\SCRNSAVE.EXE"
